cause.description: To try and get RCTV back on the air after Venezuelan president Hugo Chavez closed the station because he did not agree with what it said. Freedom of Expression, dissent, speech, and of the press is under attack and this cause is to make sure that RCTV gets back on air. Website of Free RCTV http://www.freerctv.com/index.php What we really want is for people to sign the petition online, which you can do by pressing the picture at the bottom. If you really want to donate to the cause you can go to http://www.thehrf.org/donate.html. They are called the Human Rights Foundation and it is a non-profit organization in New York. Facebook did not allow me to use them because they weren't on the list of non-profit causes so I put Human Rights Watch instead which does similar work around the world not just in the Americas. 100 Members!!!! Keep inviting people!!! 1. To get RCTV back on the air 2. To continue protesting until RCTV is back on the air 3. To sign the petition and tell as many people and get as much attention as possible form the world community
cause.mission: Get Radio Caracas Television back on air
cause.name: Free RCTV
